Image of wheelchair If you move in a wheelchair, the settings of it will be used to suggest paths that are more accessible to your equipment If you are visually impaired do not worry. As we are in the experimental version, we suggest the make of routes of up to 1,5km. If you wish to proceed, be careful! Beta version. Be careful! Help improve the path by reporting the accessibility of the region. Yes No %s meters You need to mark the start and end location of this type of sidewalk on the map Menu Open navigation menu Close navigation menu Click the button to display the menu Scoreboard My board Overall board Weekly board The weekly scoreboard is renewed every week. Do you Want to see the rules? This is the overall scoreboard. Here is shown the score of the users who most contributed with accessibility data! Is not your name here? Do not be discouraged. Contribute and get top ranking Score rules %s coins OK %sº With each accessibility mark on the map you win coins. It is perfect when at the end of a route you leave your feedback because you accumulate double coins! Score is reset every Sunday at midnight. You are a citizen who makes a difference.! Image of a podium with a trophy Image representing coins User Profile Photo that is in this scoreboard position Position in the overall scoreboard Citizen\'s name Number of coins %1$s, this is your individual scoreboard. First make your sign up through the Settings menu. Anonymous Virtual Assistant Touch to activate your conversation with the virtual assistant Hello!! I\'m Cecy, your virtual assistant. To talk to me, just touch the center of the screen. Show me what you got here. Please wait! I\'m analyzing the image! Sorry, I could not parse the image. Please try again! Sorry, something went wrong. You can try again? Sorry, I still only speak Portuguese. Please change the language of your device and try again. I need the internet to communicate. Please enable it For a better experience, activate your device\'s location To continue, please enable location on your device Feeds No feed found Twitter user photo %1$s %2$s %3$s Your routes can not be displayed. First make your sign up through the Settings menu. Image of a map From: To: Click to add a comment Like (%1$d) Like Did not like Tell us about your experience making this route Share your route on social networks Cancel Give your rating Can other users see my feedback? Thanks Sharing canceled There was an error while sharing App Not Installed Share I made a route using Moovdis, your accessibility application. Desde o início da tarde desta quinta-feira (9), os órgãos públicos de Batalha, no sertão alagoano, estão de portas fechadas. A cidade está com ruas quase vazias e ocupadas por mais de 50 policiais….Tudo isso foi causado pela tensão e pelo medo da população após o assassinato do vereador Adelmo Rodrigues de Melo, o Neguinho Boiadeiro (PSD), ocorrido na porta dsa Câmara Municipal naquele dia… Bla bla bla Back to the home Give a 1 to 5 star rating for the route Click the row for more details. You will be redirected to an external application You are on the app home screen. Here you can activate the Virtual Assistant or go to one of the screens: Map, Feeds, Scoreboard, Settings, My Routes or Invite Friends You are on the Maps. Here you can report occurrences, search for addresses and making routes Search Location or Business Marker Photo Location not yet determined Friends from Facebook Friends from Google Friends from Whatsapp Picture of friends Invite friends to Moovdis Install Moovdis right now and help map the accessibility of cities Tell your friends about the app and have fun together Marker does not exist Delete Marker By confirming, this marking will be removed from the Map Type of Marking No comments added Marker address Next step Step 1 of 2 Part of a research project of the UTFPR Collective Intelligence research group, Moovdis aims to promote the social inclusion for physically and visually impaired people, considering the various difficulties they face in their day-to-day displacement. Through a quickly contribution, you can contribute to the improvement of your city by mapping the urban accessibility, such as: reporting a hole in sidewalk, work, crime, or good things, such as: accessibility ramp, sports for the impaired people, bus stops, etc. It is also possible to get news about accessibility that are trending in social networks. Contribute and if you have any suggestions for the app improvement, send us a message. Send a suggestion email to developers Suggestions for Moovdis Send Email to Moovdis Google Maps API Demos No demos Google Play services is not installed on this device. Alpha Animate Basic Map Launches a map. Buildings Camera Demonstrates camera functions. Circles Demonstrates how to add Circles to a map. Camera Clamping Demonstrates how to constrain the camera to specific boundaries and zoom levels. Clamp to Adelaide Clamp to Pacific Reset LatLng Bounds MinZoom++ MaxZoom-- Reset Zoom Bounds Clear Clickable Color Compass Custom info contents Custom info window Default info window \u2193 Drag Melbourne Custom Duration Events Demonstrates event handling. Fade In Tiles Fill Alpha Fill Hue Flat Go to Bondi Go to Santorini Go to Sydney Ground Overlays Demonstrates how to add a GroundOverlay to a map. Hue Hybrid Indoor @string/normal @string/hybrid @string/satellite @string/terrain @string/none_map Layers Demonstrates the different map layers. \u2190 Location Source Demo Demonstrates how to use a custom location source. Google Map with circles. Mapa ainda não está pronto Map In Pager Demonstrates how to add a map to a ViewPager. Markers Marker Close Info Window on Retap Demonstrates how to close the info window when the currently selected marker is retapped. Demonstrates how to add Markers to a map. Move the camera Multiple Maps Demonstrates how to show multiple maps in a single activity. My Location My Location Demo Demonstrates how to use GMS Location. My Location Button My Location Layer None Normal Options Demonstrates how to use Options to initialize a map. Polygons Demonstrates how to add Polygons to a map. Polylines Demonstrates how to add Polylines to a map. Programmatically add map Demonstrates how to add a MapFragment programmatically. Properties for Circle(s) Properties for Polyline over Australia Properties for Polygon over Australia Rotate Gestures Raw MapView Demonstrates how to use a raw MapView. Reset Retain map Demonstrates how to reuse a MapFragment. \u2192 Rotation: Satellite Save the state of a MapFragment. Demonstrates how to save the state of a MapFragment upon rotation of the device. Drag the marker, tap on it to change its color and rotate the device to check that the state of the map is preserved. Scroll Gestures Clear Snapshot Demonstrates how to take a snapshot of the map. Area for the map snapshot. Take snapshot \u25A0 Stroke Alpha Stroke Hue Stroke Joint Type Stroke Pattern Stroke Width \u2190 Swipe \u2192 Switch Image Tags Demonstrates how to get and set tags on API objects. Map with a circle, ground overlay, marker, polygon and polyline. Tap or long press on the map Terrain Tile Coordinate Overlay Demonstrates how to add a tile overlay with tile coordinates to a map. Tile Overlays Demonstrates how to add a tile overlay to a map. Tilt Gestures \u2193 \u2191 Traffic Transparency UI Settings Demonstrates how to alter user interface settings. \u2191 Visible Regions Demonstrates how to use Visible Regions. AUS Normal More SOH SFO Wait for Map Load Width Zoom Buttons Zoom Gestures + - Start cap End cap Joint Type Pattern Butt Square Round Image Default Bevel Round Solid Dotted Dashed Mixed Grid Lite Mode Demonstrates some features on a map in lite mode. Click the map with no, one or multiple markers displayed to open the Google Maps Mobile app. Go to Darwin (No Markers) Go to Adelaide (One Marker) Go to Australia (Five Markers) Linear Lite Mode List Demonstrates using maps in lite mode in a RecyclerView using LinearLayoutManager and GridLayoutManager. Activate Higher Level Focused Building Focused Level Demonstrates how to use the Indoor API. Indoor Toggle Level Picker Go to Invalid Point Go to San Fran navigate to another panorama pan camera Panning Gestures Panorama is not ready yet Position Demonstrates how to show a Street View panorama and map. Street View Panorama and Map Standard Street View Panorama using a Fragment. Street View Panorama Standard Street View Panorama with event handling. Street View Panorama events Street View Panorama with programmatic navigation. Street View Panorama navigation Street View Panorama with toggles for options. Street View Panorama options Standard Street View Panorama using a View. Street View Panorama View Streetnames tap screen long press screen Walk Styled Map Demonstrates how to style a map. It means two friends hugged Calendar of events No application can handle this request. Please install a web browser or check your URL. is displayed on each line an accessibility event that should happen on a certain date Background image showing the event banner No Social Network Advertise your event for free.\nContact us by e-mail: acessibilidade.moovdis.app@gmail.com I want to promote my event Event name:\nShort description:\nDate of the event:\nAddress:\nEvent Website:\nFacebook:\nContact name and phone number:\n\n\nPlease attach a banner ad image. This is the main image that will appear in the app to promote your event. Places a place found in the region or through search is displayed on each line. Click on the line to mark the accessibility of the place Image of the background that shows the photo of the place %1$d meters away rate rate this place now Place accessibility not rated Accessible place Not accessible place Partially accessible place This place has parking space reserved for wheelchair users Entrance The entrance is good for people with limited mobility Internal circulation In this place there is ease of internal circulation Tactile map In this place there is a tactile map of the internal space in braille or emboss Accessible restroom There is in this place an accessible restroom Family restroom There is in this place a family restroom Comments Accessible and reserved furniture In this place there is furniture accessible and reserved for people with disabilities or the elderly All categories Touch to expand the categories Choose a category All categories Art and Recreation Faculty and Education Events Night life food Outdoor and Recreation Professional and others Residence Shops and Services Travel and Transportation Church and religion select an option from the menu.
